broker

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • broker.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an object of type Player which will contain and maintain all the relevant player profile.
    Author:
    GROUP 22 Code implementation by Leslie Nguyen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(Player toPlayer)
      This constructs a copy of a player with the original player
      Player(Player toPlayer, char newPieceColour)
      This constructor creates a copy of Player but swaps their piece colour to aid in swapping player turn
      Player(java.lang.String toName, char toColour)
      This constructs a player with a user name and piece colour.

        public Player(java.lang.String toName,
              char toColour)
        This constructs a player with a user name and piece colour.
        Parameters:
        toName - The String name is given to the instance variable of userName
        toColour - The value of the char is assigned to a new Piece through the class Piece

      • Player

        public Player(Player toPlayer)
        This constructs a copy of a player with the original player
        Parameters:
        toPlayer - The toPlayer is the original Player object that is used to create a copy

      • Player

        public Player(Player toPlayer,
              char newPieceColour)
        This constructor creates a copy of Player but swaps their piece colour to aid in swapping player turn
        Parameters:
        toPlayer - The player to copy
        newPieceColour - The new piece colour
